import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faClock, faUserGroup, faBookmark, faCirclePlus, faCircleMinus } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import classes from './MealDescription.module.css'; const clock = const user = const bookmark = const plus = const minus = function MealDescription(){ return (

PIAZZA HUT AND MOREE AMSDLA ASLDN

{clock} 45 Minutes

{user} 1 Serving

{bookmark}

RECIPE INGREDIENTS

{/*

HOW TO COOK IT

*/}
); } export default MealDescription;
